thread.title: Report highlights Ohio grandparents, college students living in poverty
thread.title_full: Report highlights Ohio grandparents, college students living in poverty

author: Jackie Borchardt, cleveland.com
title: Report highlights Ohio grandparents, college students living in poverty

organizations.name: ohio association of community action agencies

text: The Ohio Association of Community Action Agencies annual State of Poverty report highlighted poverty among grandparent caregivers and college students.
